name: Chaos: High Volume Stress
description: User has 500+ alerts pre-loaded. Tests performance and efficient querying.
challenges: Check endpoint must handle large datasets efficiently
interviewer_notes: Tests if candidate thinks about performance. Naive implementations will be slow. Look for: pagination, efficient DB queries, batch processing.
interviewer_prompt: Your implementation works great for a few alerts. But we have power users with hundreds of alerts. Can you optimize your check_and_trigger_alerts to handle this efficiently? Think about database query optimization and batch processing.
